info.title: TON HTTP API
info.description:
This API enables HTTP access to TON blockchain - getting accounts and wallets information, looking up blocks and transactions, sending messages to the blockchain, calling get methods of smart contracts, and more.

In addition to REST API, all methods are available through [JSON-RPC endpoint](#json%20rpc)  with `method` equal to method name and `params` passed as a dictionary.

The response contains a JSON object, which always has a boolean field `ok` and either `error` or `result`. If `ok` equals true, the request was successful and the result of the query can be found in the `result` field. In case of an unsuccessful request, `ok` equals false and the error is explained in the `error`.

API Key should be sent either as `api_key` query parameter or `X-API-Key` header.

get.description: Get basic information about the address: balance, code, data, last_transaction_id.

parameters.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

schema.title: Address
schema.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

parameters.name: address

get.description: Similar to previous one but tries to parse additional information for known contract types. This method is based on tonlib's function *getAccountState*. For detecting wallets we recommend to use *getWalletInformation*.

parameters.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

schema.title: Address
schema.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

parameters.name: address

get.description: Retrieve wallet information. This method parses contract state and currently supports more wallet types than getExtendedAddressInformation: simple wallet, standart wallet, v3 wallet, v4 wallet.

parameters.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

schema.description: Identifier of target TON account in any form.

parameters.name: address

post.description: Send serialized boc file: fully packed and serialized external message to blockchain.
Send serialized boc file: fully packed and serialized external message to blockchain. The method returns message hash.
Send query - unpacked external message. This method takes address, body and init-params (if any), packs it to external message and sends to network. All params should be boc-serialized.
Estimate fees required for query processing. *body*, *init-code* and *init-data* accepted in serialized format (b64-encoded).
Run get method on smart contract.
All methods in the API are available through JSON-RPC protocol ([spec](https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification)).

ignore_chksig.title: Ignore Chksig
ignore_chksig.description: If true during test query processing assume that all chksig operations return True

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: Array of stack elements: `[['num',3], ['cell', cell_object], ['slice', slice_object]]`

seqno.title: Seqno
seqno.description: Seqno of masterchain block at which moment the Get Method is to be executed

body.title: Body
body.description: b64-encoded boc-serialized cell with message body

GetAddressInformationResult.description: Raw account state augmented with computed `state`. Fields come directly from tonlib.

state.description: Computed from code/frozen_hash by the API server.

GetExtendedAddressInformationResult.description: Generic account state decoded by tonlib; contract-specific `account_state` may contain typed fields (e.g., wallet.v3.accountState).

account_state.description: Decoded state depending on contract type. For wallets, may include wallet_id and seqno.

GetWalletInformationResult.description: Parsed wallet info built by the API: wallet flags + wallet-specific fields if recognized.

DetectAddressResult.description: All possible address forms derived from the input. Exact keys depend on pytonlib utils.

GetTokenDataResult.description: NFT or Jetton information as returned by tonlib; varies by contract type.

BlocksMasterchainInfo.description: Information about the latest masterchain block.

result.description: Information about the latest masterchain block.

BlocksBlockSignatures.description: Validator signatures for a given block.

signatures.description: List of validator signatures for the block.

result.description: Validator signatures for a given block.
Consensus block information from the masterchain.

BlocksShardBlockProof.description: Proof of inclusion of a shard block in the masterchain.

result.description: Proof of inclusion of a shard block in the masterchain.
Block identifier for the looked-up block.

BlocksShards.description: List of shard blocks at a given masterchain seqno.

shards.description: Shard block IDs at the given masterchain seqno.

result.description: List of shard blocks at a given masterchain seqno.

id.description: Identifier of the block containing the transactions.

incomplete.description: Indicates if the transaction list is incomplete.

result.description: Transactions included in the specified block.

ihr_fee.description: Instant Hypercube Routing fee in nanotons.

BlocksTransactionsExt.description: Extended transactions included in a block.

transactions.description: Verbose transaction list with raw messages.

result.description: Extended transactions included in the specified block.

after_merge.description: True if block was created after a merge.

after_split.description: True if block was created after a split.

before_split.description: True if block was created before a split.

want_merge.description: Indicates if validators wanted a merge.

want_split.description: Indicates if validators wanted a split.

is_key_block.description: True if this block is a key block.

result.description: Header information of the specified block.

BlocksOutMsgQueueSize.description: Size of the outgoing message queue for a shard.

BlocksOutMsgQueueSizes.description: Outgoing message queue sizes for shards.

shards.description: List of outgoing message queue sizes per shard.

ext_msg_queue_size_limit.description: Limit for the external message queue size.

result.description: Outgoing message queue sizes for all shards.

TvmCell.description: Raw TVM cell serialized as base64 bytes.

config.description: TVM cell with the parameter contents.

result.description: Configuration parameter for the requested id (at optional seqno).

ConfigAll.description: All configuration parameters at a specific masterchain state.

config.description: TVM cell containing all configuration parameters.

result.description: All configuration parameters for the requested masterchain seqno.

tags.name: run method
tags.description: Run get method of smart contract.
